Born to Run.AUTHOR: Christopher McDougall
Born to Run.REVIEW: I absolutely love this book, it's easily one of my favourites. I love that its an entertaining story, packed with facts, and has heaps on inspo to get my outside to run! Would highly recommend!
Born to Run.TITLE: Born to Run

Chimp Paradox.AUTHOR: Prof. Steve Peters
Chimp Paradox.REVIEW: I liked the book but it was a little repetitive. I think he could have made it shorter and not lose any impact.
Chimp Paradox.TITLE: Chimp Paradox
